original_title: The All New Adventures of Laurel & Hardy in For Love or Mummy
overview: Bronson Pinchot does a nice job imitating Stan Laurel and Gailard Sartain gives a good appearance as Oliver Hardy, but the imitation does not extend to the original duo's comedy. The silly story line finds the two trying to protect a professor's daughter from a mummy that has been re-born
tagline: Their uncles paved the way for their hijinks...Now all they want is their mummy.
title: The All New Adventures of Laurel & Hardy in For Love or Mummy
